title: may 21: the release of xbox one
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the Xbox One’s controversial announcement, and how the company course-corrected since then. Afterwards, she talks about BTS’s first major milestone at an American awards show. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
